title: Throwaway Girl
description: Andy Burton knows a thing or two about survival. Since she was removed from her mother's home and placed in foster care when she was nine, she's had to deal with abuse, hunger, and homelessness. But now that she's eighteen, she's about to leave Haywood House, the group home for girls where she's lived for the past four years, and the closest thing to a real home she's ever known.Will Andy be able to carve out a better life for herself and find the happiness she is searching for?
author: Kristine Scarrow
